summary: A countess, paying a rare visit to her estate, clashes with the man she has hired to manage it.
cast: Rudolf Schock|Christine Görner|Gunther Philipp|Renate Ewert|Kurt Großkurth|Lucie Englisch|Alice Kessler|Ellen Kessler|Willem Holsboer|Viktor Afritsch|Raoul Retzer|Fritz Lafontaine|Dick Price|Ena Valduga|Katja Kessler|Hans Moser
title: Gräfin Mariza
